# The AI Museum

> Free interactive web museum covering 75 years of AI history (1950-2025). Features timeline, ELIZA/SHRDLU/PARRY simulators, quiz, AI graveyard. Next.js, open source, no login.

## Key Facts

- **75 years** of AI history coverage
- **25+ models** featured
- **8 categories** of content
- **Free** and open access

## Main Pages

- **/** — Home page with interactive timeline and featured exhibits
- **/simulator** — Run classic AI simulators (ELIZA, SHRDLU, PARRY)
- **/quiz** — Test your knowledge of AI history
- **/graveyard** — Explore discontinued AI projects and models

## Topics Covered

- Alan Turing and the Turing Test
- Dartmouth Conference (1956)
- ELIZA and early chatbots
- Expert systems era
- AI winters and recovery
- Deep Blue vs Kasparov
- ImageNet and deep learning revolution
- AlphaGo breakthrough
- GPT and large language models
- ChatGPT phenomenon
- DALL-E and generative AI
- AI ethics and societal impact
- AGI speculation and future

## Technical

- **Framework:** Next.js 14
- **Language:** React with TypeScript
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS
- **Components:** shadcn/ui
- **Deployment:** Vercel
- **License:** Open source
